aboutMini: We are a strategic design and consulting studio based in Switzerland. Our work is founded on established industry research and proven best practices in strategy, design, and digital systems.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.copy: Pay CHF 50 for a focused 60-minute session. Checkout via Stripe (Apple Pay, cards, Klarna, Amazon Pay, PayPal, TWINT). After you pay, we'll email you to schedule your call at a time that suits you.
consultation.note: Secure Stripe checkout. We'll email you right after payment to lock your call time.
consultation.agreeTermsSuffix: and understand that this booking requires payment and creates a binding agreement.
consultation.disclaimerPrefix: By continuing you agree to the

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: High-level architecture for complex business challenges and roadmap optimization.

design.title: Design
design.description: Visual languages that capture attention, drive conversions, and strengthen brand authority.

scaling.title: Scaling
scaling.description: Infrastructural growth patterns for modern enterprises in a digital-first economy.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Global market navigation, tactical consulting, and digital product leadership.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: Comprehensive analysis of your business, market positioning, and growth objectives. We analyze competitors, identify gaps, and uncover opportunities.

strategyProcess.title: Strategy
strategyProcess.description: Development of tailored strategy based on insights. We define clear objectives, milestones, and an executable roadmap.

execution.title: Execution
execution.description: Implementation with precision. From design to development, we ensure seamless operations and controlled execution.

validation.title: Validation
validation.description: Continuous measurement and optimization. We monitor metrics, test hypotheses, and adjust strategy based on real data.

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity
brandIdentity.description: Logos, visual systems, naming, positioning, guidelines, touchpoint design

digitalProducts.title: Digital Products
digitalProducts.description: Websites, apps, platforms, usability, interface design, prototyping

businessStrategy.title: Strategy
businessStrategy.description: Market analysis, growth planning, competitive positioning, go-to-market

consultingServices.title: Consulting
consultingServices.description: Fractional CMO, design leadership, strategic consulting, workshops

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity
brandIdentity.subtitle: Create visual systems that dominate your market
brandIdentity.overview: Brand identity is the foundation of your market presence. We create comprehensive visual systems that capture the essence of your brand, communicate your values, and leave lasting impressions on your audience.
brandIdentity.logoDesignDesc: Distinctive, memorable brands that represent you
brandIdentity.visualSystemsDesc: Coherent design languages across all touchpoints
brandIdentity.namingStrategyDesc: Strategic development of brand names and nomenclature
brandIdentity.brandPositioningDesc: Clear articulation of your market position
brandIdentity.touchpointDesignDesc: Unified experience across packaging, collateral, and digital
brandIdentity.processDescription: We begin with deep market research and competitive analysis to understand your landscape. Through strategic workshops and iterative design exploration, we develop visual identities that are not only aesthetically compelling, but also strategically anchored in your business goals.
brandIdentity.outcomesDescription: A complete brand identity system that provides clarity, consistency, and competitive differentiation. Your brand will be equipped with the visual tools necessary to communicate effectively and create recognition in your market.

consultationTerms.title: Consultation Terms
consultationTerms.subtitle: Please review before paying for your session.
consultationTerms.payment: Payment (CHF 50) is required to confirm your session and is non-refundable once booked.
consultationTerms.scheduling: Sessions are 60 minutes long and conducted at a scheduled time. We'll email within 3 business days to schedule your call at a mutually convenient time. You may request one reschedule with 24 hours' notice.
consultationTerms.scope: The session is limited to one 60-minute consultation; no additional deliverables are promised beyond the call.
consultationTerms.confidentiality: We keep shared information confidential but do not sign separate NDAs for these sessions.
consultationTerms.disclaimer: Guidance provided is advisory only and not legal, financial, or tax advice.
consultationTerms.refunds: If KEFE must cancel, you may choose a refund or a new slot.
consultationTerms.stripePaymentDesc: Payments are processed securely through Stripe. Stripe may collect payment data including card information, transaction details, and processing information. Please review Stripe's privacy practices at
consultationTerms.acceptTerms: By proceeding with payment, you acknowledge and accept these consultation terms and Stripe's data collection practices.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Last updated: 10.02.2026
terms.section1Text: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of services offered by Volodymyr Shalavylo (operating as KEFE), a sole proprietorship providing strategic design and consulting services in Switzerland. By using these services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.section2Text: KEFE provides strategic design and consulting services including, but not limited to:
terms.section3Text: The specific scope, deliverables, timeline, and compensation for each project will be determined in a separate agreement or proposal. Services commence only after mutual agreement of project terms and receipt of initial payment, if applicable.
terms.consultation1: Sessions are 60 minutes long and conducted at a scheduled time
terms.consultation2: Payment (CHF 50) is required to confirm and is non-refundable once booked
terms.consultation3: We'll email within 3 business days to schedule the call at a mutually convenient time
terms.consultation4: One reschedule is permitted with 24 hours' notice
terms.consultation5: The session is limited to consultation; no deliverables are promised beyond the call
terms.consultation6: Guidance provided is advisory only and not legal, financial, or tax advice
terms.consultation7: If KEFE must cancel, you may choose a refund or a new slot
terms.obligation1: Provide authorization and accurate information required for project execution
terms.obligation2: Respond to communication within reasonable timeframes
terms.obligation4: Provide necessary feedback and approvals at project milestones
terms.section5Text: Payment terms are specified in individual project agreements. Unless otherwise agreed, standard terms include:
terms.payment3: Payment due 14 days after invoice date
terms.section5aText: For 1:1 consultation sessions, we apply the following payment terms:
terms.consultationPayment1: CHF 50 payment required to confirm the session
terms.consultationPayment2: Payment is non-refundable once the session has been booked
terms.consultationPayment3: Refunds are granted only if KEFE must cancel the session
terms.consultationPayment4: If you cancel before 24 hours, you may reschedule to a new date instead of refund
terms.section5bText: All consultation payments are processed through Stripe. By making a payment, you accept the following terms:
terms.stripePayment2: Stripe may collect payment data, including card information, transaction details, and processing metadata
terms.stripePayment3: Your payment information is encrypted and transmitted securely
terms.stripePayment4: We do not store complete credit card information on our servers
terms.stripePayment5: Please review Stripe's Service Agreement: https://stripe.com/en-ch/legal/ssa
terms.stripePayment6: By continuing with payment, you acknowledge Stripe's data collection practices
terms.section6Ownership: Upon full payment, client receives ownership of final deliverables as specified in the project agreement.
terms.section6KEFEOwnership: KEFE retains ownership of all concepts, processes, methodologies, and work materials not explicitly included in final deliverables.
terms.section7Text: Both parties agree to treat business information exchanged during the engagement as confidential. This commitment persists after termination of the service agreement.
terms.section7ConsultationNote: For consultation sessions: We keep shared information confidential but do not sign separate NDAs for these sessions.
terms.section8Text: KEFE's website is hosted via GitHub Pages. Email services are provided by Apple Inc. By using KEFE's website and communication channels, you agree to use them exclusively for legitimate business purposes. The following activities are strictly prohibited:
terms.prohibited3: Malicious activities or security breach attempts
terms.section9Text: This website does not use cookies, analytics tools, or tracking technologies. Server infrastructure (GitHub Pages) may process technical data such as IP address as part of standard web hosting operations. KEFE does not access, analyze, or use this data.
terms.section10Text: All content on KEFE's website, including text, images, graphics, and design elements, is exclusive property of Volodymyr Shalavylo unless otherwise specified. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use is strictly prohibited.
terms.section11Text: Volodymyr Shalavylo is not liable, to the extent permitted by Swiss law, for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of services or this website.
terms.section12Text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Swiss law. Exclusive jurisdiction is Basel-Landschaft, Switzerland.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.subtitle: Legal disclosure according to Swiss law
imprint.infoText: In accordance with Swiss law and the principle of transparency, this page contains all legally required information about the operator of this website and the service provider.
imprint.name: Name: Volodymyr Shalavylo
imprint.servicesText: KEFE offers strategic design and consulting services, including:
imprint.responsibleText: Volodymyr Shalavylo is solely responsible for all content published on this website and through KEFE services.
imprint.legalStatusText: Volodymyr Shalavylo is a sole proprietorship offering professional strategic design and consulting services in Switzerland. This activity does not require formal registration as a business entity under Swiss law and is conducted on an independent freelancer/contractor basis.
imprint.copyrightText: All content on this website is exclusive property of Volodymyr Shalavylo (KEFE) and is protected by Swiss and international copyright laws.
imprint.thirdPartyText: This website uses the following third-party resources:
imprint.thirdParty2: Inter by Rasmus Andersson (SIL Open Font License)
imprint.prohibitedText: The following activities are strictly prohibited:
imprint.prohibited1: Web scraping, data extraction, or unauthorized automated access
imprint.prohibited2: Spam, unsolicited messages, or mass mailings
imprint.prohibited3: Security breach attempts or access to restricted areas
imprint.prohibited5: Use for illegal purposes or activities violating Swiss law
imprint.disputeText: All disputes arising from use of this website or services provided by KEFE are governed by Swiss law. Exclusive jurisdiction is Basel-Landschaft, Switzerland.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last updated: 10.02.2026
privacy.simpleSummary: KEFE does not use cookies, tracking tools, or analytics. We don't collect personal data through this website. The only information we have is what you voluntarily share with us via email, phone, or in-person meetings.
privacy.section1Text: This Privacy Policy explains how Volodymyr Shalavylo (operating as KEFE) treats personal information in accordance with Swiss data protection laws, including the Federal Data Protection Act (FDPA).
privacy.section3Continue: Your visit to this website is completely private and anonymous. No data about your browsing behavior, IP address, location, device, or other information is collected, stored, or analyzed.
privacy.section4Text: KEFE collects only personal data you voluntarily provide through:
privacy.data2: Phone calls and messaging apps (WhatsApp, Telegram)
privacy.section5Text: KEFE uses your personal data exclusively for legitimate business purposes:
privacy.use1: Communication: Responding to inquiries and maintaining business correspondence
privacy.use2: Service Delivery: Providing requested design and consulting services
privacy.use3: Project Management: Coordinating schedules, deliverables, and feedback
privacy.use4: Billing: Processing payments and managing financial records
privacy.section6Text: Per Swiss data protection law, KEFE processes your personal data on the basis of:
privacy.basis3: Consent: Your voluntary provision of information
privacy.basis4: Legal Obligation: Compliance with Swiss law
privacy.section7Text: KEFE does not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section7Continue: Limited sharing may occur only for:
privacy.sharing1: Email Services: Apple Inc.'s email services
privacy.sharing2: Website Hosting: GitHub Pages (no personal data collected)
privacy.sharing3: Payment Processing: Stripe collects payment and transaction data
privacy.sharing3Desc: For consultation payments, Stripe processes card information, transaction details, and payment metadata. Please review Stripe's data practices:
privacy.sharing4: Legal Requirements: If required by Swiss law
privacy.security1: Secure email communication with encrypted connections
privacy.security3: Restricted access to personal data (Volodymyr Shalavylo only)
privacy.section9Text: KEFE retains personal data only as long as necessary:
privacy.retention1: Active Projects: For the duration of the project
privacy.retention2: Completed Projects: For portfolio use and legal requirements
privacy.retention4: Financial Records: 10 years (required by Swiss law)
privacy.section10Text: Per Swiss data protection law, you have the following rights:
privacy.right1Desc: Request a copy of your data
privacy.right5Desc: Receive your data in structured format
privacy.section10Contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at info@kefe.ch
privacy.section11Text: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Privacy Commissioner (FDPPC):
privacy.section11Authority:
Federal Data Protection and Privacy Commissioner
Feldeggweg 1
3003 Bern
Switzerland
www.edoeb.admin.ch
privacy.section12Text: KEFE (Volodymyr Shalavylo) is personally committed to protecting your privacy. As a sole proprietor, I handle all data personally and take this responsibility seriously.
privacy.section13Text: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at info@kefe.ch

about.title: About KEFE
about.subtitle: Strategic Design & Consulting Studio
about.intro: We build strategic design systems and provide consulting that transforms businesses. With deep expertise in brand identity, digital products, and business strategy, we help companies scale their impact.
about.section1Text: KEFE is a strategic design and consulting studio based in Binningen, Switzerland. Founded by Volodymyr Shalavylo, we specialize in helping organizations create systems that scale and identities that dominate. Our approach combines proven industry practices with creative innovation to deliver measurable results.
about.section2Text: Our services span the entire spectrum of strategic design and business consulting:
about.service1: Brand Identity - Creating distinctive visual systems that capture your market
about.service2: Digital Products - Designing and developing platforms that engage users
about.service3: Business Strategy - Developing strategic roadmaps for growth and transformation
about.service4: Design Consulting - Providing strategic guidance for complex design challenges
about.section3Text: We believe in understanding your business deeply before designing solutions. Our process begins with discovery - researching your market, understanding your customers, and identifying opportunities. We then develop strategic recommendations backed by data and validated through testing. Finally, we implement solutions that drive real business results.
about.reason1: Swiss-based expertise with international perspective and proven track record
about.reason2: Strategic thinking combined with exceptional design execution
about.reason3: Personalized service with direct access to leadership
about.reason4: Focus on measurable results and long-term partnerships

notFound.title: Page Not Found
